amendment.description: To provide for the treatment of certain entities for purposes of payments under the Medicare program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1126 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1126 proposed by Senator Grassley for Senator Dole. (consideration: CR S8681, S8684; text: CR S8684) To provide for the treatment of certain entities for purposes of payments under the Medicare program.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1126 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1126 proposed by Senator Grassley for Senator Dole.
